Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Vercel deployment build errors

- Add lib/db.ts with Prisma client export for 19 dependent files
- Add components/ui/alert-dialog.tsx for family-member-linker and payment-methods
- Fix email templates: change $var to {var} to prevent build-time evaluation
- Fix Stripe service: use lazy initialization to avoid missing API key during build
- Change reminders cron from every 15 min to daily \(Vercel Hobby plan limit\)

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

- Update /api/v1/patients route to use Prisma for CRUD operations
- Update /api/v1/users route to use Prisma for CRUD operations
- Create admin patients page with real data fetching
- Update admin users page with real data fetching
- Add loading states, error handling, and form validation
- Add table and collapsible UI components
